com.mapbox.services.api.staticimage.v1.models

Class StaticPolylineAnnotation.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.api.staticimage.v1.models.StaticPolylineAnnotation.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    StaticPolylineAnnotation

    public static class StaticPolylineAnnotation.Builder
extends Object
    Builder used for passing in custom parameters.
    Since:
    2.1.0

      Call to build a new instance of a StaticPolylineAnnotation object.
      String getFillColor()
      Provides a String representing the hex code for the fill color.

      If set, a number between 0 (transparent) and 1 (opaque) for the fill opacity.

      The current polyline string being used for the paths geometry.

      Provides a String representing the hex code for the line stroke.

      A Float between 0 (transparent) and 1 (opaque) representing the lines opacity.

      Get the currently set stroke width for the line.

      Optionally pass a 3- or 6-digit hexadecimal color code for the fill.

      Optionally pass a number between 0 (transparent) and 1 (opaque) for the fill opacity.

      • getStrokeWidth

        public Double getStrokeWidth()
        Get the currently set stroke width for the line.
        Returns:
        Positive Double value representing the stroke width.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • setStrokeWidth

        public StaticPolylineAnnotation.Builder setStrokeWidth(double strokeWidth)
        Positive Double value for line stroke width. If a negative value is passed, a ServicesException will occur.
        Parameters:
        strokeWidth - A positive double value.
        Returns:
        This StaticPolylineAnnotation builder.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getStrokeColor

        public String getStrokeColor()
        Provides a String representing the hex code for the line stroke.
        Returns:
        A 3- or 6-digit hexadecimal color code as a String.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • setStrokeColor

        public StaticPolylineAnnotation.Builder setStrokeColor(String strokeColor)
        A 3- or 6-digit hexadecimal color code for the line stroke. If a non-valid color's provided, a ServicesException will occur.
        Parameters:
        strokeColor - A string containing a 3 or 6 digit hexadecimal color code.
        Returns:
        This StaticPolylineAnnotation builder.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getStrokeOpacity

        public Float getStrokeOpacity()
        A Float between 0 (transparent) and 1 (opaque) representing the lines opacity.
        Returns:
        a Float value between 0 and 1.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • setStrokeOpacity

        public StaticPolylineAnnotation.Builder setStrokeOpacity(float strokeOpacity)
        A number between 0 (transparent) and 1 (opaque) for line stroke opacity. If a value out of range is provided, a ServicesException will occur.
        Parameters:
        strokeOpacity - a float value between 0 and 1 representing the lines opacity.
        Returns:
        This StaticPolylineAnnotation builder.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getFillColor

        public String getFillColor()
        Provides a String representing the hex code for the fill color.
        Returns:
        a 3- or 6-digit hexadecimal color code for the fill.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • setFillColor

        public StaticPolylineAnnotation.Builder setFillColor(String fillColor)
        Optionally pass a 3- or 6-digit hexadecimal color code for the fill. If a non-valid color's provided, a ServicesException will occur.
        Parameters:
        fillColor - a string containing a 3 or 6 digit hexadecimal color code.
        Returns:
        This StaticPolylineAnnotation builder.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getFillOpacity

        public Float getFillOpacity()
        If set, a number between 0 (transparent) and 1 (opaque) for the fill opacity.
        Returns:
        a float value between 0 and 1 representing the fills opacity.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • setFillOpacity

        public StaticPolylineAnnotation.Builder setFillOpacity(float fillOpacity)
        Optionally pass a number between 0 (transparent) and 1 (opaque) for the fill opacity. If a value out of range is provided, a ServicesException will occur.
        Parameters:
        fillOpacity - a Float value between 0 and 1.
        Returns:
        This StaticPolylineAnnotation builder.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • getPolyline

        public String getPolyline()
        The current polyline string being used for the paths geometry. You can use com.mapbox.services.commons.utils.PolylineUtils#decode(String, int) to decode the string using precision 5.
        Returns:
        A string which containing the paths geometry information.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • setPolyline

        public StaticPolylineAnnotation.Builder setPolyline(String polyline)
        A valid encoded polyline encoded as a URI component. This can be created using the com.mapbox.services.commons.utils.PolylineUtils#encode(List, int) utility.
        Parameters:
        polyline - A string containing the paths geometry information.
        Returns:
        This StaticPolylineAnnotation buidler.
        Since:
        2.1.0

      • build

        public StaticPolylineAnnotation build()
                               throws ServicesException
        Call to build a new instance of a StaticPolylineAnnotation object.
        Returns:
        a polyline object ready for usage with the Static Image API.
        Throws:
        ServicesException - If any issues are recognized that could cause API errors.
        Since:
        2.1.0
